label: 駅家
対訳語: households in charge of post roads
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Also called ekiko.  Households whose duty it was to take care of the post horses (ekiba) and post ferries (ekisen) at the post stations (eki). [駅馬、駅船、駅]
